description:
Luffy batters a baffled Blueno with his powerful new fighting style, and the cowardly Spandam begins to panic at the sound of the Straw Hats approaching!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everything Is to Protect My Friends! Second Gear Activated!
Je ferai tout pour protéger mes amis ! Le "Gear Second" en action !
Subete wa Nakama o Mamoru Tame ni! Gear Second Hatsudou
Всё, чтобы защитить накама! Второй уровень!
全ては仲間を守る為に! ギア2発動
